Go East at Joshua Liner Gallery preview

Posted on Mar 25, 2012 in Art Updates | No Comments

Kraken, US Currency on canvas, 16″ x 16″ 2012

This is the first of a small series I am exploring.

It will be shown alongside other new currency collage work at Joshua Liner Gallery in NYC next month.

Please visit the gallery’s website to learn more and get details about the opening.
